Wingstop never disappoints! The wings are always hot, crispy, and packed with flavor. My go-to flavor is Lemon Pepper ‚Äî it‚Äôs the perfect mix of tangy and salty ‚Äî but honestly, you can‚Äôt go wrong with any of them. The Louisiana Rub and Mango Habanero are also top-tier if you like a little kick.

Their fries are underrated too ‚Äî that sweet, seasoned flavor is addicting. The ranch? Easily the best fast-food ranch out there. Service is usually quick, and everything comes out fresh, even when it‚Äôs busy.

Overall, Wingstop is my go-to spot when I‚Äôm craving wings that actually taste fresh and have real flavor. Definitely worth every bite!
REAL TASTY REAL GOOD!!!!
Ashley is the best cashier ever !!

Desde la frescura de los ingredientes hasta la calidez del personal, todo fue una celebraci√≥n de la buena y deliciosa  comida  ¬°Una experiencia que vale la pena repetir una y otra vez , ambiente fresco y  agradable, los personales , me atendieron como nunca me hab√≠a atendido con una buena vibra atenci√≥n  al cliente original no dejes que te lo cuente corre al restaurante y m√≠ralo por ti mismo üôåüèΩü•∞ü•∞ü•∞

store # 1783
placed an online order and picked up in a timely and friendy manner. staff was professional and kind.
Malayasai was a great hostess and she took really good care of me when I didn‚Äôt know what I wanted plus, she was super sweet and I will be going back.
Ashley customer service was spectacular! She was so patient and was very helpful in my decision making. The food came out fast and fresh. Will def be coming back
Ashley was one of the best representatives. She was knowledgeable about everything Wingstop had to offer. Best experience ever!

This location of wingstop is really good. They make my food fast and it‚Äôs fresh. When I ask for extra they make sure to make my order exactly the way I want it. I also like the way how they still make a way to get to customers who come in to order instead of pushing us to the side for DoorDash services. They make sure everyone gets good service.

Location(1114 Flatlands Ave)
Service guest: (10008)
The man that took my order was very respectful he took his time to explain my options and he made the experience here very good.
Great customer service and friendly staff. Definitely one of the better locations.
So lazy workers and disrespectful

Its been a while since I've come to this location, but I must say I do love the changes. The wait time was much shorter, store was clean and the customer service is way better then I remembered. I will be coming back soon.

The WORSE!!! I dont eat their chicken anything‚Ä¶ I‚Äôve had the Corn on the cob once before ( introduced by my sister) corn was fresh and tasty - which was the reason I ordered 8/27/25. Horrible experience! Corn on the cob was NOT FRESH, OVER COOKED, OVER SEASONED and SOGGY! Entire order went in the trash. I was so disappointed and dissatisfied. I will NEVER ORDER from Wingstop again! I wouldn‚Äôt be surprised if the doors are closing soon for this fast food restaurant. ‚úåüèæ

DO NOT ORDER FROM THIS PLACE!!!! UNPROFESSIONAL & RUDE.I ORDERED 15 WINGS WITH FRIES AND SODA, WHEN MY ORDER ARRIVED I GOT A DIFFERENT ORDER.THEY SENT 5 PARMESAN TENDERS AND SOGGY FRIES.I CALLED THE RESTAURANT AND EXPLAINED TO THE "CUSTOMER REP" THAT THEY SENT THE INCORRECT ORDER TO ME .SHE  GONNA ASK IF I COULD PICK THE ORDER UP AFTER I SPENT $ ORDERING ON UBER EATS. I TOLD HER NO!!! BECAUSE THEY MESSED UP. THE LADY GONNA SAY FIRST OF ALL IT WAS NOT HER FAULT AND HUNG UP. I CALLED AGAIN REQUESTING TO SPEAK TO A MANAGER  & SHE HUNG UP AGAIN. MY FRIEND CALLED FROM HER NUMBER AND ASKED THE LADY FOR  HER NAME AND SHE REFUSED. BOTH THE MANAGER & EMPLOYEE ARE UNPROFESSIONAL.

I order online, call to inform the Manager to ensure my wings a cook well, b/c uber orders are treated like trash.  Sje assures me my wings will be cook wwll, I said and Ill give you a review.  Welp‚Ä¶the wings cook well but NO DAMN LEMOND PEPPER FLAVOR, it was horrible NO FLAVOR FRIED HATD CHICKEN,, all they had to say was sorry 3 times.  Always SORRY to mess up anyway.  Im over it ü§ûüèæ

Last time ordering from this place customer  service was very horrible.  Server had a bad attitude and spoke to me in a very unprofessional manner.  They really  need to do better..  If I could  i definitely would  of given them a 0 rating.

Simple. Made an online order. Entered the store. Not 1 worker asked me what i was picking up or making an order. Completely ignored. Barely anyone in there and it took nearly 1-1/2 hours to retrieve my food. Shut this place down and put it out of its misery

Today I had a good experience at this location , I had gotten the best customer service  by Damire . I was very lucky have him help me with my order he recommended the garlic Parmesan boneless chicken wings and offered me a beverage so glad that I came to this location . This is my new wingstop location I will be revisiting very soon .

My advice: always order your food ahead of time, and assume it'll take a minimum of 40 minutes before your order is STARTED.
Under-staffed, slow employees, and non-stop mobile orders make the service terrible.

The food is the only thing keeping me coming, so i only order when I have a deal/ coupon to make it worth the wait.

Run don‚Äôt walk to this Wingstop and get the hot honey classic wings with ranch and thank me later!   The absolute best, they always cook my wings to perfection every single time.  The Quality is consistent here and the store is really clean.

I am going to brutally honest and going to begin by saying that my order was beyond good.

I had a mild chicken sandwich with pickle and it was phenomenal, I used to like Chic-fil-A but not no more after I tried Wing Stop for my very first time EVER!.

I also ordered the 6 pc mild wings (drum) and they were really good, not too spicy I can‚Äôt enjoy my food and not to light to add more hot sauce, they were perfect!.

Oh but let me tell you about the Loaded Fries, they‚Äôre good too. I thought I was going to be cheese and bacon, instead they were fries with cheese and blue cheese and I felt I had discovered a new continent oh and the cheese wasn‚Äôt the melted slice cheese other places put in your fries. This melted cheese is legit.

The service was good, the lady helping us was nice, had a genuine smile, she even made suggestions and explained the menu (something you rarely see it nowadays).

The environment does work and not because of the staff, they had the place CLEANED and ORGANIZED, it‚Äôs more from the ownership/management side as there only so much the staff can do, but for the location I would say it blends in.

Overall..
5 stars on the food.
5 stars on the service.
5 stars on the cleanliness.
3 start environment (needs love from the franchise level).

I ordered online and was told the wait was 43 - 48 minutes for pickup. I arrived as indicated only to wait 30 more minutes. The cashier and the folk in the kitchen were all on their phones. The manager was worse AND UNINVOLVED. Got home 5‚Ä¶
Franklin took my order and he was so professional he definitely lit up my day definitely be back soon
I ordered through Uber Eats, their service was great. Wing stop on the other hand had the nerve to send me 1 chicken tender and 1 chicken nugget. My order called for 2 chicken tenders. Really.

My family ordered food from here and when the food was received we were missing half of our order. When we called the workers there had disgusting attitudes. This is not the first time we are missing food from an order either .

Customer service is top tier. My host name was Vaziyah, not only was I greeted with a kind warm welcoming she was very patient and polite while I decided indecisively with my order. I did not feel rushed at all. And although she was working at the counter I felt the restaurants cleanliness with her also wearing a hair net. I will be returning back to this location.

Horrible service.  EXTREMELY unprofessional.  This behavior would not be tolerated in a gentrified area of Brooklyn.  Staff cursing at one another, excessive horseplay and inappropriate conversations. Needless to say, we won‚Äôt be back. I don‚Äôt accept foolishness just because it is convenient.

I made an online order for pick up 30 min before showing up there and when finally I came in to get my food, they still didn't even start my order yet and I had to wait another almost a whopping 20 min to finally get it ready for me

I ate from this location b4 but today the wings was so bland. I saw the cook throw sm pale looking wings in the fryer. And I guess 20mins later that's what I got. Bland wings covered w my 3 flavors of choice. You just don't serve ppl anything.
Ordered on uber eats, with priority & it still took 2 hours to make 8 wings & fries. Unacceptable.
This place is always severely understaffed. Be prepared to wait on a long line for a VERY long time to get your food.
